item.title: OSEP a Victory
item.description: So I just recently passed the PEN-300 course and got my OSEP. It was a truly fun but difficult journey. I wanted to briefly write a few things down before I forget them in hopes that they might help someone in the future. The Timeline So, I will admit fault here; I slacked off for a bunch of months. I bought the course back in January and had a year-long access pass.
